title: Cheese
data:
{{obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Comestible |name=Cheese |cost= ? |weight=4 }} {{flavour|A lump of cheese.

Upon Eating: Mmm... [cheese].}} A food which provided 1200 [[nutrition]], regardless of dietary needs. There were many different kinds of cheese hidden throughout the dungeon, but the difference was purely cosmetic. ==Types== *Camembert *Cheddar *Edam *Fruit cheese *Goat cheese *Mozzarella *Sheep cheese *Wensleydale *Yak cheese ==History== *Cheese was removed in [[0.15]]. However, [[pizza]] is still capable of generating with any of the cheese varieties as a topping. [[Category:Comestible]]
